name: uncertainly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you do not know what to do or believe, or are not able to decide about something: She laughed a little uncertainly. He got off the bus and stood uncertainly on the street. See
uncertain
More examplesFewer examples"Have you got the time?" he asked her uncertainly.The audience applauded uncertainly, confused about whether the show was finished.He moves uncertainly, as if he's always a little off-balance.
